subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: Note the difference in the upper right component between Chinese, where it resembles [[ケ]] (half of [[⺮]], [[竹]]), and Japanese, where it is rather [[匕]].

subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|臥|血|ls=ic}}. Note the migration of the dot from [[血]] → [[皿]] to a third stroke of [[人]] → [[ケ]]/[[匕]].

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[supervise]]; to [[oversee]]
# {{lb|zh|historical}} [[proctor]]; [[supervisor]]
# to [[control]]; to [[take charge]]; to [[direct]]
# {{lb|zh|historical|of crown prince or senior statesman}} to [[act]] for the [[monarch]]
# {{lb|zh|historical}} [[duke]]s or [[prince]]s under an [[emperor]]
# {{†}} to [[imprison]]; to [[incarcerate]]
# [[prison]]; [[jail]]; [[gaol]]
# {{†}} to [[command]]; to [[lead]]
